sections.title: Territory 1 — Instalasi Flutter
content: Petunjuk singkat berikut memuat perintah inti.

sections.title: Territory 2 — IDE & Android SDK
content: Android Studio: install SDK Platform, Emulator (AVD)
VS Code (opsional): install extension Dart & Flutter
Setup device: emulator / device fisik, cek adb

sections.title: Territory 3 — Buat Project Flutter Pertama
content: Gunakan r untuk hot reload, R untuk restart

sections.title: Territory 5 — Kode App Sederhana
Territory 6 — Debug, Hot Reload & Tools
content: Hot reload: tekan r saat flutter run
Flutter DevTools: performance, widget inspector, network
Pro-tip: flutter analyze untuk static analysis, dart format . untuk formatting

sections.title: Territory 7 — Build & Release
content: Android release APK: flutter build apk --release

sections.title: Territory 8 — Flutter Web: SEO & PWA
content: Tambahkan meta tag, Open Graph, structured data di web/index.html

sections.title: Territory 9 — Troubleshooting Umum
content: Build error: cek versi Gradle & plugin
iOS signing: pastikan provisioning profile cocok
